title: Double slit - slit spacing for 400 nm light

content.question: Light of wavelength <math alttext="400 newton meters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>400</mn><mtext>​</mtext><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>nm</mtext></math> passes through a pair of narrow slits and forms an interference pattern on a screen. The screen is <math alttext="1.0 meters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1.0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>m</mtext></math> away from the slits, and the distance between adjacent brightness maxima in the interference pattern is <math alttext="0.025 meter" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>0.025</mtext><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>m</mtext></math>. What is the approximate distance between the two slits?
